title: Looking for duo partners (bronze)
body: Just looking for duo partners for ranked, tired of being held back in bronze by all these bad players :/ I main {{champion:74}} top and mid, and if i get a good ADC, {{champion:16}} is really good now with ancient coin buffs. HMU if you're a good player on here and tell me what you play :) Still looking

replies.body:
>  tired of being held back in bronze by all these bad players :/

Faster you drop that attitide, the faster you'll get out of bronze. Only person you control is you. Duoing with another bronze player wont magically solve the problem
Because 1 out of 5 players can control anything lol at least with 2 good players you have a chance.

> [{quoted}](name=Gloomies,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=PpGqPk6h,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-06-18T07:53:50.831+0000)
>
> Because 1 out of 5 players can control anything lol at least with 2 good players you have a chance.

I think we had more than a 'chance' ;) GG easy games! 10/10 would duo again.

> Faster you drop that attitide, the faster you'll get out of bronze. Only person you control is you. Duoing with another bronze player wont magically solve the problem

Duoing did solve that problem :)

Add me on my bronze account - ian0426915.

Reply to this  thread if you're interested in gaming tonight - If there's a reply I'll log on after 5pm and duo all night buddy!

Pretty sure we're the most OP bronze duo around.

:D

Add me xXGTOXx 

Really want to play duo with someone :P
